description: This file defines a React functional component 'CategoryChips' that renders a horizontal scrollable list of category chips with active highlighting. It includes a nested 'Chip' component for individual category items, styles definitions, and type annotations for props.

methods.name: CategoryChips
methods.description: Functional component rendering a horizontal list of category chips with active highlight.

methods.name: Chip
methods.description: Internal functional component representing an individual category chip.
